data.description:
Welcome to Tennis Esports, the virtual tennis application that combines the excitement of virtual reality tennis with the competition and fun of tennis. Play with real tennis swings, and immerse yourself in the ultimate world of virtual sports from virtually anywhere.

Tennis Esports is as realistic as virtual sports gets, replicating all the spins and swings you can even enhance your experience with a VR Tennis handle! For beginner players wanting to give tennis a go, to amateur tennis fans and avid players, Tennis Esports is a fun and useful tool to learn and enjoy tennis at any level from your school, office or home! 

Build up your skills and compete in live matches, and climb the global rankings on the Tennis Esports Tour, challenge yourself with MirrorPlay©, or become addicted to the excitement of HitEmAll, our famous arcade tennis target game.

With Tennis Esports you can play in a stadium, on any surface with a small or a big space. Get fit playing running mode against our AI opponents or enable voice chat with Instant and Custom match play. Set up your own player profile and create your own virtual tennis avatar where you can see your skills, unlock prizes and represent your country!

Tennis Esports is for gamers, tennis players and sports fans of all ages. Join the Tennis Esports community on Discord to find players and keep up to date with competitions, find friends, opponents and win prizes! 
 
Download our app and join Discord! https://discord.gg/8rcSArKJD4

Dear Friends of Tennis,

A light tune-up for your VR tennis game to keep things running smoothly. 
Stay sharp—our next update is set to serve up something huge! 
Version 2024.9.0 brings the following changes:

#Improvements
UI: Renaming of "Booster Level" to "Difficulty Level"

#Bug Fixes
Hit'Em All: Volley now only counts on first surface contact on the other side

Keep swinging, and enjoy the upgraded experience!

Serving up a big THANK YOU to our community!

Your Tennis Esports Team

Dear Friends of Tennis,

We’re excited to bring you a swift sprint of enhancements in your favorite VR tennis app! Version 2024.8.1 introduces two thrilling new features designed to elevate your game play experience.

#New Features
Locomotion: We've added a new continuous "Thumb Move" option, allowing you to control your position on the court with the thumb stick of your non-dominant hand. You can choose the UP direction of the thumb stick (towards the net, hand direction, or head direction).
Thumb Move: With the new "Auto Move" feature, the player automatically moves to the hit point but can override this by using the thumb stick. If deactivated, the player remains stationary unless the thumb stick is used (Advanced mode).
ELO: Your player profile now displays your current ELO , the top 10 players on Tennis Esports, and your rank in the global ELO leader board.

#Improvements
Settings: added settings to the game mode pause menu.

#Addon
New Coaching Rule: Introducing the "Racket Miss Rule" to sharpen your game play.

#Bug Fixes
AI Challenges/Trainings: All users can now access these game modes again.

Keep swinging, and enjoy the upgraded experience!

Serving up a big THANK YOU to our community!

Your Tennis Esports Team
